column4: Precedence in expressions - higher number equals higher priority
If True operator type (signed vs unsigned) and type expansion for constant values will depend on the sign of both values,
otherwise they will only depend on the sign of the constant value

column14: Denotes an error if this gets through to the code generator
Move data from one location to another
Store an immediate value into (eg) a variable
DEPRECATED: Used for a load+store where the primitive itself does the load or store (i.e. write immedate value to variable)
Conditional branch with a constant expression (immediate value)
Load data into registers (for a function call with params passed in registers)
Highest value of variable or type or array bound
Lowest value of variable or type or array bound
Poke a value into a memory address
Previous value of an ordinal type
Size in bytes required to store a variable or type
Next value of an ordinal type
Swap high and low bytes of a 16 bit variable
Start new line (ie. Write end of line marker)
Write any integer type to the display
Convert character or string to lower case
Length of an array or string
